title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
content: UFC 277Multi Master Challenge   1st place: 2 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 1 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: .5 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1 point)b)  Predict how many Total Strikes Match 13 winner will score (if it's a draw, the highest of the two Total Strikes scored will be used)Matches13) Julianna Pena vs. Amanda Nunes 12) Brandon Moreno vs. Kai Kara-France 11) Derrick Lewis vs. Sergei Pavlovich10) Alex Perez vs. Alexandre Pantoja9) Magomed Ankalaev vs. Anthony Smith8) Alex Morono vs. Matthew Semelsberger7) Drew Dober vs. Rafael Alves6) Dontale Mayes vs. Hamdy Abdelwahab5) Rafa Garcia vs. Drakkar Klose4) Adam Fugitt vs. Michael Morales3) Ji Yeon Kim vs. Joselyne Edwards2) Nicolae Negumereanu vs. Igor Potieria1) Orion Cosce vs. Mike MathethaOdds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-277-pena-vs-nunes-2/matchesExample13) Julianna Pena 12) Brandon Moreno 11) Derrick Lewis 10) Alex Perez v9) Magomed Ankalaev 8) Alex Morono 7) Drew Dober 6) Dontale Mayes 5) Rafa Garcia 4) Adam Fugitt 3) Ji Yeon Kim 2) Nicolae Negumereanu1) Orion CosceTotal  (Small print)* Prizes will be prioritized based on overall general forum participation and activity *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **
